alert.note: Alert for Juana Diaz; Ponce (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 04 at 12:43PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Juana Diaz and Ponce, Puerto Rico. * WHEN...Until 245 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1142 AM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to around 1 inch are expected over the area, as a line of showers continues to push onshore. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Ponce, Juana Diaz, Coto Laurel, Luis Llorens Torres, Aguilita, Capitanejo, Guayabal, Potala Pastillo, Las Ollas, Marueno, Rio Canas Abajo, Tallaboa and Playita Cortada. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
